titles.title: Impeaching Robert F. Collins, judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana, of bribery and other high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1633)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/24/1993--Introduced. Impeaches Robert F. Collins, a judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana, for bribery and other high crimes and misdemeanors.
